Text: The two companies have some 10 million subscribers and a fixed network that covers 3.1 million households in Romania. Their combined revenues were over EUR 1 billion in 2018.
Cause: The two companies have some 10 million subscribers and a fixed network that covers 3.1 million households in Romania.
Effect: Their combined revenues were over EUR 1 billion in 2018.
Sentence: <e1>The two companies have some 10 million subscribers and a fixed network that covers 3.1 million households in Romania.</e1> <e2>Their combined revenues were over EUR 1 billion in 2018.</e2>
